name: Robonesia
description:
Description

How do you handle a world you do not remember? What if you are also now a robot? If these are questions you are interested in, then Robonesia is for you.

You play the part of a robot that has the soul of a human. A scientist tried to merge your human brain with the robot but all your memories where lost.

Your only hope is to speak with the townsfolk and restore your memories. Can you figure out what your owen name is? What about how you died?

A game made as part of the GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022.

This is a game in active development that will change over time as more features are added.

Keyboard+Mouse Controls

WASD - Movement
Left Click - Interact with menus

Requirements

Windows - 64bit
Storage - 104MB

Licenses
